title: Happy Birthday: Inochi Kagayaku Toki (Re-Birthday)
synopsis: After being abused by her mother physically and mentally Asuka gets taken in by her grandparents. Slowly she learns her own worth as a human being and overcomes many obstacles.
characters: ['Fujiwara, Asuka', 'Shuzo', 'Kanazawa, Junko', 'Mr. Sanada', 'Hamamoto, Akiko', 'Masako', 'Kobayashi, Daisuke', 'Fujiwara, Naoto', 'Fujiwara, Shizuyo', 'Hanamura, Megumi']
